name: tsumugi
description: A simple WordPress theme for blogs.
author: Yusuke Takahashi <youthkee@gmail.com>

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --precision 10 sass/style.scss style.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --precision 10 sass/editor-style.scss editor-style.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --precision 10 sass/bootstrap/tsumugi.scss bootstrap/tsumugi.css
